text: Crawford Stanley (Buzz) Holling, (December 6, 1930 â€“ August 16, 2019) was an American-born Canadian ecologist, born in Theresa, New York. Holling was one of the co-founders of ecological economics. In 2008, he won the Volvo Environment Prize. He was an Emeritus Eminent Scholar and Professor in Ecological Sciences at the University of Florida. Holling died on August 16, 2019 in Nanaimo, British Columbia at the age of 88.In Memoriam: Crawford Stanley (Buzz) Holling, OC FRSC ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Canadian ecologists Category:Canadian academics Category:Scientists from New York (state) Category:People from British Columbia Category:University of Florida
title: C. S. Holling
